author: David Nakamura
title: Trump’s move against the World Health Organization is latest twist in a shifting policy on China
description: The president has also taken China’s word for its response to the coronavirus but says the U.N. body erred in doing the same.
content:
On Wednesday, Trump accused the agency of willfully doing Chinas bidding, at the expense of global health, as he justified the holdup in funding.
Took them a long time to realize what was going, but I have a feeling they knew exactly what was going, Trump sa… [+9335 chars]
